scripts.generate:html: nuxt generate && node scripts/clean-static-html.cjs && node scripts/move-statics.cjs
scripts.generate:one: nuxt generate && node scripts/clean-static-html.cjs && node scripts/move-page-to-root.cjs && node scripts/fix-paths.js && node scripts/remove-style-tags.cjs
scripts.build:static: npm run generate && npm run fix-paths
scripts.build:static2: npm run generate && npm run copy-assets
